agents.name: Agent1
agents.note: Completed US-023: Detect 12V adapter disconnect. Implemented PowerMonitor class with GPIO/I2C power status readers, power transition logging, power source display integration, power saving mode (reduced polling, display dimming), database logging. 65+ tests passing.

agents.note: Completed US-024: Create profile management system. Implemented ProfileManager class with Profile dataclass, CRUD operations, default Daily profile creation, active profile tracking. 53 tests passing.
